attributes.action: enforce UK banks to adhere to same-day BACS transfer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this age, transferring money from one bank to another via BACS can take 3 to 5 working days to achieve. We all know that the banks use this 'gap' to invest in the money until its needed and taking into account 5.5 BILLION transactions a year, this is a lot of money invested, and preventing the receipient of the money to the interest.

Please petition the govenment to force banks to do same-day BACS as standard and bring the UK banking into the modern age. (Also concidering that BACS have a new computer comissioned in July 2006 for this requirement).
